Terms of Service

Rental Agreement Terms

These Terms of Service govern your use of Marga Enterprises' copier and printer rental services.

1. Rental Period

Rental agreements are available in short-term (events) and long-term (monthly/yearly) options. The rental period begins on the delivery date.

2. Equipment Care

Clients are responsible for reasonable care of rented equipment. Normal wear and tear is expected and covered.

3. Maintenance & Support

All rental plans include maintenance, repairs, and technical support at no additional cost.

4. Payment Terms

Payments are due as specified in your rental agreement. We accept various payment methods for your convenience.

5. Termination

Either party may terminate the agreement with proper notice as specified in the rental contract.

Contact Us

For questions about these terms, contact us at marga.enterprises2013@gmail.com or call 09171642540.
